title: Fluid-Based Triboelectric Nanogenerators: Unveiling the Prolific Landscape of Renewable Energy Harvesting and Beyond
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00482E, Review Article
Lihong Jiang, Xinlin Liu, Junling Lv, Gaojie Li, Peiyuan Yang, Yumeng Ma, Haiyang Zou, Zhong Lin Wang
Fluid-based triboelectric nanogenerators (F-TENGs) is a cutting-edge technology that leverages fluids as a contact medium to harness renewable energy through contact electrification (CE) and electrostatic induction. Noteworthy is its remarkable...
